original_text: But the Lord said to David my father, Forasmuch as it was in thine heart to build an house for my name, thou didst well in that it was in thine heart:
korean_text: 여호와께서 내 아버지 다윗에게 이르시되 네가 내 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축할 마음이 있으니 이 마음이 네게 있는 것이 좋도다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said to David my father
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주께서 나의 아버지 다윗에게 말씀하시기를

sentences.original_text: Forasmuch as it was in thine heart
to build an house for my name
sentences.korean_translation: 내 이름을 위해 집을 짓고자 했으니
